original_title: Woher kommst du eigentlich? Schwarze in Deutschland
overview: Prejudices, ignorance, and racism still leave their mark on the everyday life of black Germans, respectively Europeans, until today. How do Afro-Germans deal with their history? Which colonial-racist patterns still shape our society today? With insights into various historic epochs, it is made clear that THE history of the Black people does not exist. And neither exists THE history of white people.
title: Woher kommst du eigentlich? Schwarze in Deutschland
